scenario_text.value: Well, here we are at last.

This was where it all started, when we came
here in our world.

Yeah, and if I hadn’t brought you here, none
of this would’ve happened. I... I’m so sorry.

Hey, I wasn’t blaming you! Seriously, none of
this was your fault, Miu.
Minoru! Don’t upset Miu like that!

Oh, stop it! This is no time to be starting a
fight!

Miu, it’s all right. None of us blame you for
what happened.

Besides, I’m the one who made you show us the
way.

Hey, that’s enough of that. This wasn’t
anybody’s fault. Just our bad luck.
Right... Thanks, everyone.

Now, the place we’re looking for should be
just behind here...

Finally! I was so nervous, that felt like an
eternity.

Huh?! Everybody, watch out! I’m sensing
something real bad!
Is it an enemy?!

Probably... But it’s still far away, so
I think we’re safe for now.
*sniff* *sniff* It’s coming from the shrine.

Are you serious?! I mean, I know we’ve gotten
closer, but that’s still really far away!
Kewkew!

No doubt about it. The shrine’s filled with
some crazy aura. Kunemon’s sure of it.
It’s gotta be the Master, right?

If we can already sense him from here, then
this is really bad!
Takuma, we’d better move fast!
Right, let’s go, everyone!
